title: Bluetooth Speaker 5.0, Zamkol Portable Wireless Outdoor Speakers Enhanced Bass, 30W and 10H Playtime, 360° Full Surround Sound, IPX6 Waterproof, for iPhone, Samsung, Huawei, Computer and More
feature_list: 🎵 【360 ° Surround Sound】 - Zamkol Bluetooth Speaker provides high quality 360 ° sound for huge and amazing sound. The volume can be controlled with a simple rotating wheel, allowing you to enjoy beautiful sound anytime, anywhere, whether you use it at home or during outdoor activities.

🎵 【Advanced Bluetooth 5.0 Technology】 - Our outdoor Bluetooth speaker features advanced Bluetooth 5.0 technology for fast, powerful and stable connectivity. It is compatible with all Bluetooth devices, such as mobile phones, tablets, computers, etc. After restarting the speaker, it can automatically connect to the last used device.

🎵 【Exceptional 30 W Bass Performance】 - Wireless Bluetooth Speaker via Exclusive dual speaker enhances bass while enhancing the clarity of middle and treble notes. 30 watts of power delivers incredible volume through a dual-precision stereo driver, even at maximum volume without distortion.

🎵 【True Wireless Stereo (TWS)】 - With the TWS technology, two Zakmol ZK202 Wireless Speakers can be paired for true wireless Bluetooth playback on the left and right channels of the two Zamkol Bluetooth speakers. Just control the TWS master to play the enhanced stereo on both devices.
🎵 【100% After-Sale Guarantee】 - Our offer 30 days full refund replacement, replacement service within 12 months, 24-hour mail consultation service to make your peace of mind to use the speaker.
